transcript:
Customer: Hello ji namaste sir.
Executive: Haan namaskar sir. Sir aapne concern raise kiya hua tha not make business.
Customer: Maine concern raise hi nahi kiya tha nahi maine email dala hai. Haan matlab maine highly please reach aur mujhe feedback ka option aaya to maine se feedback dalna hai. Haan.
Executive: Haan. To not make a business ka yahan par feedback hamare paas aaya tha sir to kya hai na sir concern raise ho jata hai hamare paas. To fir hame connect karna hota hai ke matlab kya issue hai.
Customer: Issue kuch nahi itne din ho gaye yaar. Regular by leads leta hu fir bhi abhi tak deal kuch nahi hua.
Executive: Achcha matlab kahan deal ruk jati hai ek bar aap mujhe itna bata payenge sir ke deal convert hone mein kahan time lag raha hai thoda.
Customer: Communication error.
Executive: Communication error matlab communication kahan par ruk jati hai sir jaise agar aap baat bhi karte honge to matlab rate mein dikkat aati hai ya quantity mein ya location wise ya kaise dikkat aa jati hai.
Customer: 20 to 25% mein call hi nahi pick up hota hai. Achcha 20 25% pick hi nahi hoti hai. 25 20 to 30 uske baad jo rate hai 75% usme se 30% ka kya hota hai ki call hota hai. Baat hoti hai wo log bolte hai catalog bhej dijiye whatsapp catalog bhejte hai whatsapp pe follow up lete hai call pe follow up lete hai no follow up.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: 30% lead wahi pe chali jati hai 30 to 40%. Achcha. 40 plus 25 65. Haan. Remain 35%. Wo log dekhte hai karte hai karte hai karte hai uske baad kuch bhi nahi main follow up leta hu follow up le jata hai kuch bhi kuch nahi bolte nahi chahiye kuch requirement nahi hai. Main to sirf aise hi dekh raha tha mujhe purchase nahi karna hai abhi abhi to sirf dekh raha tha vagaira vagaira.
Executive: Achcha. To ye matlab issue aa raha hai mainly.
Customer: Ji mainly issue aa raha hai ki order place nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Thik hai. Matlab jo by lead aap consume kar rahe hain wo to relevant hi consume kar rahe hain na sir usme aisa to nahi hai. Bilkul bilkul. Haan ji sir. Haan wo to bilkul. Haan. Jaise aapne check kar leta hu aapne. Aaj aapne consume ki hai silk bandhej sari IOC karke hai buyer name Mumbai 11 November aaj hi consume ki hai 1:43 minute. To inse baat hui thi to kya baat hui matlab communication nahi hua abhi tak.
Customer: Nahi nahi.
Executive: Achcha communication hi nahi ho paya hai. Bas consume ho gayi hai lekin communication nahi ho paya hai. Thik hai. Aur sir kya hota hai kya hota hai kabhi kabhi main bahar hota hu na. To bahar hota hu to tabhi kya software hota nahi hai to lead leta hu. To main by lead le leta hu kyuki hamara wholesale ka business hai. Haan haan haan. Haan. By lead le leta hu to baad mein sari jab bhi free hota hu tabhi main contact kar leta hu lekin contact usi din karta hu. Haan. Aur software update karna hota hai kya baat hui kab baat hui kya message bheja photo bheja ya nahi bheja wo sab tabhi ho sakta hai jab mere paas software ho kabhi bhi to main software har bar wo aisa possible nahi hota to kabhi by lead new fresh milti hai to main le leta hu lekin wo 100% within 24 hours mein sabhi ko baat kar leta hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan. Matlab main samajh gaya matlab aisa hota hai ki aapke paas software nahi hota hai to aap by lead consume kar lete hain fresh fresh lekin ek time par particular call unko fir karte hain. To aap aap ek bar koshish kijiye multiples times call karne ke jaise ek aap call kar lijiye teen se char bar call karta hu. Achcha teen se char bar karte bhi hai. Minimum it is minimum. Achcha. Achcha minimum minimum do bar to call karta hu aur do bar do bar se teen bar whatsapp pe follow up leta hu photos bhejta hu group ki link bhejta hu sab kuch karta hu.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Achcha. Haan ji. Tab bhi tab bhi nahi mil pa raha hai abhi. To dekhiye sir abhi thoda aapne trust seal to abhi ye pehli bar hi package liya hai na sir. Maine is company se pehli bar liya hai dusri company hamari Anil and craft usse maine trust seal le liya hai aur maine use bhi kiya hai. Haan. Haan ji achcha to aap thoda wait kijiye ho sakta hai ki abhi aapka kya hai profile creation ho raha ho pehle bhi aap pura ek mahina khatam hone wala hai. Weekly 34 leads mil rahi hai 34 into 4 34 24 matlab kareeb kareeb 132 leads mil rahi thi mere ko 132 mein se zero sale. Thinking what is happen. Achcha October mein aapne 71 by leads jo consume ki to unme ek bhi conversion nahi ho paya sir. Ek bhi nahi hua hai. Ek bhi nahi hua. Nahi. Nahi ye bhi bata sakta hu ki kinone ab tak call hi nahi uthaye kinone pehli bar call uthaya kinone dusri bar call uthaya uthaya kinone tisri bar call uthaya tisri bar call uthane mein kya baat hui dusri bar uthane mein kya baat hui sab kuch data hai hamare paas. Everything. Jab waha pe column hota hai na sale waha pe sabhi ka zero zero zero hai abhi tak. Achcha. Matlab conversion aapka nahi mil paya hai abhi tak aapko. Bilkul. Bilkul. Dekhiye sir yahan se main itni help jarur kar sakta hu ki aapko jo by leads hai jo relevant hai wo de sakta hu aur calls inquiries mein agar issue hai wo kar sakta hu jaise abhi main check kar raha hu aapki jo kuch dekhne wala hu ek mahine tak main kuch bhi raise nahi karne wala agar ek mahine ke baad bhi mujhe same problem aayi. Kya sir? Ek mahine ke baad bhi mujhe agar same problem aayi to fir main complaint dalna email dalunga complaint likhwaunga India mart mein wo karunga so to fir main apna sab kuch chalu karunga main aur ek mahina wait karta hu main usko koi dikkat nahi mujhe pata hai ki agar aap 132 lead monthly dete hai 132 ke 32 sale nahi milegi mujhe sale milegi mushkil se 30 logo ki ya 32 logo ki 100 lead aise hi chali jayegi usme koi dikkat nahi hai 32 logo ke liye mujhe sale to milni chahiye repeat order to milna chahiye hamara wholesale aur manufacturing ka isliye main India mart se juda hua hu varna to main aise retail ki dukan kar leta hu koi dikkat nahi hoti. Bilkul bilkul bilkul samajh raha hu sir aap aap dekh lijiye priority pe daliye aur agar aise hi raha to fir mujhe aur option dekhne padenge. Sir dekhiye yahan se jitni help hogi sir aapko better ROI milne mein main wahi koshish karunga main apne end se koshish kar sakta hu sir. Lekin aap bhi follow up le rahe hain sir dekhiye aap koshish kijiye convert karne ki kaise bhi lekin yahan se agar koi dikkat hai aapko profile ke regarding catalog ke regarding ya by leads mein wo thik guarantee main yahan se leta hu wo thik karne mein main yahan se help kar sakta hu lekin conversion to sir aapko hi karna hoga kyuki aapka product hai sir isliye lekin main yahi koshish kar sakta hu sir aapko. Thik hai sir. Aur ye jo aapka issue jo concern aapka raise hua hai use close kar du. Haan ji abhi close kar dijiye. Haan abhi close kar deta hu aur aapko feedback ke liye ek mail ya text aayega whatsapp par to aap usme yes kar dijiyega sir aur iske alava maine check kiya aapki kuch products hai unme sir aapki primary category added nahi hai. Jaise ladies kurti ladies designer kurti to iski primary category available hai hamare paas. Kya hai uski category? Primary category available hai jisse ki most relevant aapko iske liye product wo by leads aapko aayenge sir. Thik hai. To agar aap to wo kar du agar aap chahte hai to. Haan ji ji ji haan haan ji bilkul mujhe abhi kurti ki jyadatar jyada leads chahiye. Ek second sir. Thik hai to main abhi thoda hu abhi busy to main aapko baad mein connect karu kya aapka haan aapka concern close kar du sir. Haan ji concern close kar dijiye koi dikkat nahi feedback ke liye aayega to usme aap yes kar dijiyega sir thik hai sir. Thik hai aur abhi aapne bola tha monthly ek meeting hogi hamari to next meeting kabhi hogi. Next aap jab bhi aap jab bhi aap free honge tab aap sir dijiyega main aapko direct number ko free rehta hu to saturday ko hum dopahar ko 12 baje kar lete hai. Thik hai saturday sir dekhe possible to nahi hota hai lekin month ke last saturday saturday hota hai. Koi dikkat nahi nahi koi dikkat nahi to friday ko 12 baje kar lete hai. Aur main aapko message kar deta hu apna direct number us pe aap mujhe call kar lijiyega jo bhi issue hota hai sir thik hai sir. Thik hai sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- No conversion from buyleads despite follow-ups.

- Software unavailability hinders timely lead management.

- Expresses concern about lack of sales.



Resolution:

- Executive assured help with relevant buyleads.

- Agreed to close the raised concern.

- Agreed to add primary category to products.

- Scheduled next meeting on Friday at 12 PM.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to provide feedback via WhatsApp.

- Executive to share direct contact number.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, conversion, follow up, trustseal, primary category
